thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: Lynn
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by Lynn

author: Lynn
title: Lynn
text: I was a little leery of ordering online without seeing the product other than via a picture. But what a surprise! I ordered the teddy bear musical carousel for our friends who just had a baby. I was extremely satisfied with the product and even amazed at how big it actually was. Definitely recommend. The delivery of this gift was also extremely fast and the engraved name was perfect.
